started to include django forms -> help what am i doing

soo much has changed geez we now use 2 templates that expand on bbankbase for displaying the views changed the model so that the default for execute datime is now 1 day in the future and not now changed from forms with a manually written view to a view class using django forms some minor UI improvements happened aswell everything is now displayed in € insted of $ corrected the decimal places displayed probably more note to self commit more

made it so that the bank-index now also shows transfers which are incomming also added a distinction for incomming and outgoing transfers so that the amount changes color according to if the balance went up or down

added admin functionality to execute transfers on singular transfers
also added django-q in order to execute the new transfers daily

changed the login form to be a Django-Form
changed the Viewset for transfers to include transfers sent to the logged in user aswell as from him/her/apache
started to implemenet dynamic loading of additonal information
fixed rounding issue

soo much has changed geez we now use 2 templates that expand on bbankbase for displaying the views changed the model so that the default for execute datime is now 1 day in the future and not now changed from forms with a manually written view to a view class using django forms some minor UI improvements happened aswell everything is now displayed in € insted of $ corrected the decimal places displayed probably more note to self commit more

added admin functionality to execute transfers on singular transfers
also added django-q in order to execute the new transfers daily

changed the login form to be a Django-Form
changed the Viewset for transfers to include transfers sent to the logged in user aswell as from him/her/apache
started to implemenet dynamic loading of additonal information
fixed rounding issue
